resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
projjal opened a new pull request #12417:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12417


   For example following pattern 'abc-xyz%' doesn't work however 'abc-xyz' works. This is because special characters are escaped to work with regex matcher, but when they are optimised with starts_with/ends_with/is_substr function these escape characters are not currently removed for the default case ('\' escape char).


--

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description: For example following pattern 'abc-xyz%' doesn't work however 'abc-xyz' works
fields.summary: [C++][Gandiva] Like function doesn't properly handle patterns with special characters in certain cases
